resources.string: What do you want to study today?

RECTEM REDEEMERS COLLEGE OF TECHNOLOGY AND MANAGEMENT
SCHOOL OF SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY
DEPARTMENT OF COMPUTER SCIENCE
FIRST SEMESTER EXAMINATION 2020/2021 SESSION (FT)

COURSE TITLE: INTRODUCTION TO COMPUTING
CLASS: ND 1 (FULL TIME)
COURSE CODE: COM 111
COURSE UNITS: 3
TIME ALLOWED: 3 HRS
INSTRUCTION: Answer any Four (5) Question

a. Itemize various technology in each of the Generations of Computer
b. Compare and Contrast an Electronic Data Processing and the Mechanical Data processing
c. Define the followings:
1 Information
ii. Data processing
iii. Flowchart
iv. Algorithm
V Registers
